the problem here is at&t is the only line line service. yes the system is 1950's and at&t is dropping the speed from 12 mgb to 7mgb. has something to do with the distance. this i understand since worked on main frames patch panel switch boards in the the military in the late1960. i won't go wireless until security is improved. thank u for for your insight. what we need is more people bringing this subject up more often so more r aware of these problems. at&t is using stone age equipment with 21st sentry technology. i am just waiting to see if the monthly fee stays the same if the since mgb has been dropped 5 mgb. i am less then 1 block from the main junction box and ask if at&t can run a new line. i know that's a prayer. my opinion is the trunk line is getting moisture. this problem only occurs when it is windy and raining. and these lines have a massive amount of noise. thank u for your interest. ED S
HI it would be nice of u if can get a contact # thank u have a good day

Message.Title: In memory of FDR
Message.Msg: Our Commander in Chief during WWII gave an autographed copy of the Bible to anyone under his command who asked for one. On the fly leaf was written: To the Armed Forces: As Commander-in-Chief, I take pleasure in commending the reading of the Bible to all who serve in the armed forces of the United States. Throughout the centuries men of many faiths and diverse origins have found in the Sacred Book words of wisdom, counsel and inspiration. It is a fountain of strength and now, as always, an aid in attaining the highest aspirations of the human soul. Very sincerely yours, Franklin D. Roosevelt. The current CC has ordered that no officer should have a Bible in sight on his desk because it might be offensive to some.
This order by 'el presidente' ... is against 'my' U.S. Constitution as it states 'Freedom Of Religion' .. and I AM "AGAIN" DEEPLY OFFENDED by him and his Executive Order !!
Google it and you can find out how it works in other places. Job descriptions and salaries are all available.
An officer appeared on the Huckabee TV program and said that he would not comply with the executive order and would continue to refer his men to the Bible when it seemed appropriate.

"The current CC has ordered that no officer should have a Bible in sight on his desk" Just another made up lie. This CC has mentioned Christianity and Scripture, even quoting it directly, more than any Pres in many decades. So why would such a good and Godly man as our CC, order such a thing? He didn't order it is the answer. Can he even do that? If you disagree, prove it. Not with lies from others, but from the source, show where he ordered that. When you realize it is a lie, are you going to continue with it? I bet you will.
Obama made no such order. More lies from the Tea Brains. You are what you are. Liars and racists.
POOR 'icky' .. and you are what you are .. a forked tongue mush-brained bigot !! Quit drinking that fermented stuff and try some 'iced tea' for a change .....
I would rather believe the officer who appeared on the Huckabee show who was a recipient of the order that you say Obama never made. What do you know about what orders are given to the military?
"So why would such a good and Godly man as our CC" not be more transparent in his actions? You have no idea what he is doing and neither does anyone else except those he is doing it too.

Topic.Title: USAA insurance running a scam. If your house burns they don't pay you on the spot (full payment option). They force you to rebuild and use their low bid and then nickel and dime you to death. Switch to a full payment up front company! not the same co. 20 years ago switch to Chubb, etc. USAA and Robles== RICO at its finest

Message.Msg: In 1952 I worked for an insurance company for seven months and learned first hand what a scam insurance is. My job was reviewing risk histories to make sure premiums were at least 35% greater than claim settlements on all plate glass policies. Clients would have been better of putting their money in the bank.
That happened a long time ago and what possible difference can it make now?
"the economy is recovering nicely, the deficit is shrinking rapidly". Tell a big enough lie often enough and the majority will believe it is the truth.

A few years back there was a Black with dreadlocks wandering White neighborhoods late at night. Cops stopped him numerous times to check him out. He then tried sueing the police for targetting Blacks. Funny, I'm White and I was stopped a few times early in the evening in a business district. I used to park my car after work north of downtown San Diego out of the metered and timed parking areas after work and walk several blocks to a movie in town. I would get out after dark and walk back to my car. I was stopped several times and asked what I was doing there. Once I explained they left. I never felt picked on as the cops were just doing their job.

There are several witness accounts and I see no point in trying Zimmerman her. A trial was needed and a trial will be had. But I am not aware of any witnesses that saw the altercation between Zimmerman and Martin begin. Unless you can provide evidence of such an account I will assume you are lying as, of course, Tea Brains habitually do. Zimmerman's quote was that he did not follow him but was "just going in the same direction as him." Which he seemed to think was different that rest of the time he spent following him.
Or maybe your not lying. Maybe you're that dumb that you believe "callers to a local radio station". Sheesh.
"I really wonder what's behind you and your crowd supporting Zimmer." It's pure racism. You've seen it here and you've seen how they've tried to portray Martin in the conservative press.
Seriously wilkes. Maybe the stock market is lying to you too. You couldn't see the truth if it beat you over the head with golden hammer.

Then provide executive order number wilkes. Or any evidence other than "some guy said on Huckabee". This is absolutely ridiculous. Obama did not order that military officers cannot have a Bible on their desk. It is a complete lie.

Message.Title: To Those That Are Not With Us...
Message.Msg: As time passes our memories easily wane ...we try to reach back to those beautiful days of our youth . Those that gave all were never given that opportunity for they left us so young ....in places most have never heard of or ever will know of ...they had no cameras to capture what they did...what they gave, how they endured to the end.. We bicker ...they fought and gave everything ....theirs were not words but deeds ...we as one should bow our heads and give thanks to they that silently defended us so far away . This day should be theirs ...not ours the living....give to them what is their due ....honor and our undying respect and gratitude .Never forget and hold in your hearts the families of those that lost something that can not be replaced, the child they raised,cherished and loved .....may the Lord soothe their broken hearts .
